ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def OnCMDCANCELARExecute(command, entity): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode # recupera a lista que representa o breadcrumb breadCrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles() item = breadCrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CN_APONTAMENTOS")) command.TransitoryVars["HANDLEAP"] = item.Handle

def OnCMDGerarCREExecute(command, entity): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode # recupera a lista que representa o breadcrumb breadCrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles() item = breadCrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CN_APONTAMENTOS")) command.TransitoryVars["HANDLEAP"] = item.Handle

def OnCMDReceberExecute(command, entity): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode # recupera a lista que representa o breadcrumb breadCrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles() item = breadCrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CN_APONTAMENTOS")) command.TransitoryVars["HANDLEAP"] = item.Handle
